name: Bullet Wizard
description:
Brackeys Game Jam Submission 2021

A Twin Stick Rogue like bullet hell would be putting it generously You are a wizard, They were a bunch of cultists, you said, see ya later boi, they weren't good enough for you. They didn't respond quite as hoped for, maybe they just didn't get the reference. Either way, now you must fight your way out! Go as far as you can! Delve into dungeons to find new weapons and other supplies! Beware the chaos of the depths. It might end up being more than you bargained for!!!

This was made with python and the pygame module! 

Features : 

  • Infinite World Gen
  • Random Dungeons
  • 512 Different Weapon Graphics...
  • 4 Different Bosses 
  • 3 Turtle Doves
  • 2 Enemy variants, that will steal weapons left on the floor if you let them
  • and 1 player image
